fulltext:
NGUYỄN THÁI SƠN 
Skills Summary 
 
Inspirational skills 
 
Persistence & self-motivation 
 
Communication skills 
 
Relationship Building 
 
Time management skills 
 
Continuous learning skills 
 
Strategic Thinking 
Education 
- 
Graduate Diploma in Computer Application - Transworld Institute of Business 
Management, Bangalore, India (09/2006 - 06/2009) 
- 
Microsoft Certified Technology Specialist in Windows Server 2008 Network Infrastructure 
and Active Directory, Configuration 
- 
Microsoft Certified IT Professional (MCITP) 
- 
Inbound Sale Certificates 
Experience 
11/2018 – 06/2019 
Team Leader & Account Manager 
EZ Solution 
- 
Manage team of 6 personnel include: 3 Sales, 1 Pre-Sale, 1 Customer Success Executive. 
- 
Manage the assigned customer database. Improve customer satisfaction by improving 
responsiveness and anticipating customer needs.  
- 
Responsible for Upsell, Cross sell and Renewal 
01/2018 – 10/2018 
Director of Can Tho branch 
EZ Solution 
- 
Implement recruitment, training personnel at the branch. 
- 
Build customer database, evaluate purchase behavior and customer needs. 
- 
Market research, building marketing and advertising strategies. 
- 
Implement promotional programs according to company plans 
- 
Monitor and report the business and financial situation at the branch 
10/2017 – 12/2017 
Team Leader 
2 
EZ Solution 
- 
Manage team of 6 salespeople and participate in sales. 
- 
Join the company's recruitment steps, train and help team members to become A Player. 
- 
Set goals for team and members, operate, organize team meetings, ensure team work 
closely and effectively to achieve the goals set. 
- 
Participate in quarterly meetings of the company, communicate to members about the 
development orientation, company culture. 
05/2016 – 09/2017 
Salesperson 
EZ Solution 
- 
Calling customers to find out information, management needs and difficulties that 
customers are having 
- 
Consulting management solutions for shop owners, supporting customers to achieve the 
objectives of managing and operating the store 
- 
Convince customers to use sales management software 
- 
Report plans, goals, daily work results. 
10/2015 – 04/2016 
Customer Success 
EZ Solution 
- 
Consulting the operation process and store management with software for customers in 
the retail and restaurant industry. 
- 
Responsible for guiding customers to use software in accordance with the agreed 
process. 
- 
Warning vulnerabilities in store management, combined with shop owners to ensure that 
employees always operate the software properly. 
- 
Support, care, create relationships with customers after sales directly or remotely via 
Teamviewer. 
- 
Consulting sales of service packages and associated products when customers need to 
expand or upgrade. 
06/2012 - 08/2015 
Network Management Engineer  
FPT Telecom  
- 
Manage transmission lines, determine arising problems, errors on network system, 
transmission lines in responsible area and promptly troubleshoot  
- 
Support clients, solve problems for them at home, instruct clients on how to set up and use 
network devices correctly and troubleshooting ways for easy problems  
3 
- 
Receive feedback from clients, thence suggest and take measures to improve network 
quality and clients’ satisfaction  
- 
Translate technical documents into Vietnamese under requests  
- 
Support colleagues in daily works to complete common goals  
- 
Learned points: Communication, Teamwork, Problem solving, Time management  
11/2010 - 02/2012  
Salesperson  
Phu Thinh Co., Ltd.  
- 
Following up the consumption of resellers and retailers in the assigned area  
- 
Assess customers' needs, explain and demonstrate product features  
- 
Sell company’s products in the assigned market/territory within the respective business 
group  
- 
Quote and negotiate prices and credit terms, prepare contracts and relative 
documentation  
- 
Develop and maintain strong business relationship with existing and new resellers  
- 
Effectively plan sales and services activities in assigned territory to ensure that sales plans 
and targets are achieved  
- 
Meet established sales quotas and revenue goals  
- 
Follow up credit collection 
Awards and Acknowledgements 
- 
Excellent sales staff 3rd quarter of 2017 
- 
Excellent salesman First Quarter 2019 
- 
The branch achieved the highest sales in August 2018

experiences.detail:
- Manage team of 6 personnel include: 3 Sales, 1 Pre-Sale, 1 Customer Success Executive. - Manage the assigned customer database. Improve customer satisfaction by improving responsiveness and anticipating customer needs.
- Responsible for Upsell, Cross sell and Renewal

- Implement recruitment, training personnel at the branch.
- Build customer database, evaluate purchase behavior and customer needs.
- Market research, building marketing and advertising strategies.
- Implement promotional programs according to company plans
- Monitor and report the business and financial situation at the branch

- Manage team of 6 salespeople and participate in sales.
- Join the company's recruitment steps, train and help team members to become A Player. - Set goals for team and members, operate, organize team meetings, ensure team work closely and effectively to achieve the goals set.
- Participate in quarterly meetings of the company, communicate to members about the development orientation, company culture.

- Calling customers to find out information, management needs and difficulties that customers are having
- Consulting management solutions for shop owners, supporting customers to achieve the objectives of managing and operating the store
- Convince customers to use sales management software
- Report plans, goals, daily work results.

- Consulting the operation process and store management with software for customers in the retail and restaurant industry.
- Responsible for guiding customers to use software in accordance with the agreed process.
- Warning vulnerabilities in store management, combined with shop owners to ensure that employees always operate the software properly.
- Support, care, create relationships with customers after sales directly or remotely via
Teamviewer. - Consulting sales of service packages and associated products when customers need to expand or upgrade.

- Manage transmission lines, determine arising problems, errors on network system, transmission lines in responsible area and promptly troubleshoot
- Support clients, solve problems for them at home, instruct clients on how to set up and use network devices correctly and troubleshooting ways for easy problems
Receive feedback from clients, thence suggest and take measures to improve network quality and clients’ satisfaction
Translate technical documents into Vietnamese under requests
Support colleagues in daily works to complete common goals
Learned points: Communication, Teamwork, Problem solving, Time management
- - - -

- Following up the consumption of resellers and retailers in the assigned area
- Assess customers' needs, explain and demonstrate product features
- Sell company’s products in the assigned market/territory within the respective business group
- Quote and negotiate prices and credit terms, prepare contracts and relative documentation
- Develop and maintain strong business relationship with existing and new resellers
- Effectively plan sales and services activities in assigned territory to ensure that sales plans and targets are achieved
- Meet established sales quotas and revenue goals
- Follow up credit collection
